title: Requirements for a Valid Lease Agreement
text: A lease agreement must include the names of the parties (landlord and tenant), the description of the property, the term of the tenancy, the amount of rent, and the signatures of the parties.  Certain other provisions may be required or prohibited by law.

title: Types of Lease Agreements
text: Lease agreements can be for a fixed term (e.g., one year) or periodic (e.g., month-to-month).
